Class LocalServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport.impl.java.LocalServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DtoNode, DtoSender, ServerNode

    public class LocalServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerNode
    Server side of the java-based local transport. For unit testing purposes. only one server per JVM
